title: problem getting mastery 6
body: im relatively new to the game (played for about 1-1/2 weeks) i finally got to mastery 5 with zilean and got 2 s's playing but getting mastery 6 i need a zilean permanent, shard or 500 blue essence. how do i get the zilean permanent? what even is it

replies.body: The only thing I would like to add here is that Champion Shards would disenchant into Champion Essences (blue).  Cosmetic Essences (orange) are currently exclusive to skins.  By obtaining a Zilean Shard, it won't be necessary to spend any additional essences.  I know there are a lot of gears working with Hextech Crafting and Masteries, but we have a solid [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) that may help!  Let us know if you have any questions, and welcome to League of Legends!

A Zilean permanent is basically an upgraded shard (which would grant you Zilean permanently if you didn't own the him). 

I suggest purchasing Hextech Mystery Champion shards in the Store (Under the Accessories tab) and disenchant them into Orange Essence. You should only need 3 or 4 shards to acquire enough essence.
